snippet: A federal judge on Tuesday blocked new limits to ballot access for minor parties, increasing the chances that Gov. John Kasich, a Republican, will face a third-party challenger this fall.
abstract: Federal Judge Michael H Watson issues preliminary injunction blocking new limits to ballot access for minor parties, increasing chances that Ohio's Republican Gov John Kasich will face third-party challenger in 2014l.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Tuesday blocked new limits to ballot access for minor parties, increasing the chances that Gov. John Kasich, a Republican, will face a third-party challenger this fall.

headline.main: Ohio: Ballot Rules for Minor Parties Are Blocked
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Ballot Rules For Minor Parties Are Blocked
